decks.notes: The deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana through spells like Dark Ritual and Cabal Ritual to cast spells like Infernal Tutor or Ad Nauseam to find and play key combo pieces like Tendrils of Agony or Empty the Warrens to deal a large amount of damage to the opponent in a single turn. The deck also includes interaction like Duress and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also including cards like Wishclaw Talisman to tutor for key combo pieces. The inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion provides additional value by allowing players to replay key combo pieces from the graveyard.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Bomberman combo of Auriok Salvagers and Lion's Eye Diamond to generate infinite mana, allowing for various win conditions such as Walking Ballista. Zirda, the Dawnwaker acts as a companion to reduce the activation cost of important artifacts and creatures. The deck aims to assemble the combo pieces quickly, control the board with disruption like Karn, the Great Creator, and protect key pieces with cards like Karakas. The key strategy is to efficiently generate and use mana to set up a game-winning combo.

This deck focuses on quickly playing low-cost creatures like Delver of Secrets, Monastery Swiftspear, and Sprite Dragon, while supporting them with spells like Ponder, Preordain, and Brainstorm to maintain card advantage. Counterspells like Daze and Force of Will are used to protect your creatures and disrupt your opponent's plays. Removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Gut Shot help clear the way for your creatures to attack. The mana base is streamlined with fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistent access to the deck's key colors.

The deck focuses on quickly getting out powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Griselbrand by using cards like Show and Tell and Eureka. The goal is to cheat these big threats into play for little to no cost, overwhelming the opponent with their power. The deck also includes a number of cantrips and counterspells to dig for combo pieces and protect your creatures once they hit the battlefield. The mana base includes lands that allow for quick, explosive plays to get your threats out as soon as possible.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly drop powerful Eldrazi creatures onto the battlefield and overwhelm the opponent with their aggressive abilities. By using cards like Eldrazi Mimic, Matter Reshaper, Reality Smasher, and Thought-Knot Seer, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also utilizes cards like Chalice of the Void to control the opponent's spells, while utilizing mana acceleration from cards like Elvish Spirit Guide and Ancient Tomb to cast powerful threats ahead of schedule. Overall, this deck focuses on speed, disruption, and aggressive strategies to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize cards like Cabal Therapy and Green Sun's Zenith to set up the graveyard for Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis and create a powerful board presence with Primeval Titan and Field of the Dead. The deck also includes a toolbox of creatures like Scavenging Ooze and Reclamation Sage to deal with specific threats, along with cards like Mox Diamond and Elvish Reclaimer to ramp up and fix mana. The inclusion of cards like Ramunap Excavator and Wasteland provide additional disruptive elements to control the opponent's resources.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly assemble the Dark Depths combo using cards like Vampire Hexmage and Thespian's Stage. The deck uses cards like Crop Rotation and Elvish Reclaimer to search for the key combo pieces efficiently. It also includes strong disruption cards like Thoughtseize and Cabal Therapy to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis provide additional threats and value. The deck aims to win the game quickly by creating a 20/20 Marit Lage token with Dark Depths.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's resources and game plan while deploying aggressive threats to quickly close out the game. By utilizing cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Sanctum Prelate to tax the opponent's spells and Aether Vial to cheat in creatures, the deck aims to control the game tempo. Stoneforge Mystic and equipment like Umezawa's Jitte and Sword of Fire and Ice provide additional aggression, while cards like Flickerwisp offer disruptive and versatile plays. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure, disrupt the opponent, and secure victory through efficient and aggressive gameplay.

This deck focuses on quickly putting pressure on the opponent with aggressive Goblin creatures while disrupting their resources with cards like Wasteland and Rishadan Port. The use of Aether Vial allows for fast deployment of creatures and maximizing their efficiency. The inclusion of Goblin Matron and Ringleader allows for efficient tutoring and card advantage, respectively. The deck also includes cards like Munitions Expert and Goblin Cratermaker for removal and versatility. Overall, the strategy involves overwhelming the opponent with fast and efficient creatures while disrupting their game plan with resource denial and removal.

The deck focuses on quickly generating mana through rituals and acceleration like Chrome Mox and Lotus Petal to cast a devastating spell like Goblin Charbelcher to deal lethal damage in a single turn. Cards like Burning Wish and Land Grant add consistency to the combo strategy, while cards like Gamble provide a way to tutor for key pieces. The deck's speed and explosiveness make it a force to be reckoned with in Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on quickly assembling the Dark Depths combo using cards like Crop Rotation, Sylvan Scrying, and Thespian's Stage. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with cards like Thoughtseize, Inquisition of Kozilek, and Duress while protecting the combo with Pithing Needle and Not of This World. By generating mana through Lotus Petal and Elvish Spirit Guide, the deck can quickly create a 20/20 Marit Lage token to win the game. Additionally, the deck includes utility lands like Karakas and Bojuka Bog to further control the game state and disrupt the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to use a variety of Sliver creatures in combination with cards like Aether Vial and Cavern of Souls to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of powerful creatures. The deck focuses on aggressive plays and leveraging the synergies between different Sliver abilities to create a formidable board presence. Cards like Force of Will provide disruption and protection, while utility lands like Karakas and Mutavault provide additional flexibility in gameplay. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain a dominant position throughout the game.

The primary focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Faithless Looting, then utilize reanimation spells such as Animate Dead and Reanimate to bring them back onto the battlefield for a powerful advantage. The deck includes high-impact creatures like Griselbrand, Elesh Norn, and Ashen Rider to overpower opponents quickly. With a heavy emphasis on combo and reanimation strategies, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures early in the game.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the combo of Show and Tell to cheat powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Griselbrand onto the battlefield for free. The deck also includes cards like Omniscience and Veil of Summer to protect the combo and generate card advantage. Additionally, there are cards like Cunning Wish and Intuition to tutor for important combo pieces when needed. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats, ultimately aiming to win the game in a single explosive turn.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent through aggressive creatures like Young Pyromancer, True-Name Nemesis, Dreadhorde Arcanist, and Delver of Secrets. It also includes powerful disruptive spells like Force of Will, Daze, and Lightning Bolt to control the game and protect its threats. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying fast threats and burning the opponent down for a quick victory. It's a fast-paced and efficient strategy that aims to win the game before the opponent can establish their own game plan.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's resources through cards like Chalice of the Void and Abrupt Decay while ramping up mana with cards like Mox Diamond and Green Sun's Zenith. It aims to generate value through land-based creatures like Dryad of the Ilysian Grove and Primeval Titan, eventually overwhelming the opponent with lands like Field of the Dead and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. The inclusion of cards like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Tireless Tracker provides additional value and card advantage, making it difficult for the opponent to keep up with the deck's powerful land-based strategy.
